title: Side-Branch Intravascular Lithotripsy for an Uncrossable Chronic Total Occlusion.
abstract: This case describes percutaneous coronary intervention of a chronic total occlusion of the right coronary artery at the RV marginal bifurcation that was wire-uncrossable until plaque modification with side branch intravascular lithotripsy into the right ventricular marginal allowed crossing.

authors.name: Denise Tiong
